q: supportive" man. The X Factor host continued to dispel myths about the music mogul's character, having previously described the 51-year-old as "down-to-earth". Dermot O'Leary explained to the Daily Mail: He's a very interesting man, Simon Cowell . He's incredibly supportive as a boss and he shows a lot of compassion, but he hates indecision and he hates fear. "What he loves is confidence without arrogance, which is the holy grail. I've learnt a lot from him, and I owe him a great deal. Asked to sum up his relationship with Simon Cowell , the ex - Big Brother's Little Brother presenter stated: "Well, Simon Cowell is Simon Cowell , a very busy man. I might have a meal with him

Donald Rumsfeld suggests that President Bush was at fault for not doing more to resolve disagreements among senior advisers. Whenever you have a caretaker CEO, they're supposed to stay in place until the founders have enough experience, he said. "Larry had enough experience about four years ago."
